dcterms:creator: Thin Nguyen
Hang Le
Thomas P Quinn
Tri Nguyen
Thuc Duy Le
Svetha Venkatesh
dcterms:description: The Pokec-z dataset is drawn from Pokec, a Facebook-like social network in Slovakia, based on regional information. The sensitive attribute is the region of a user, and the goal is to predict the field of work of a user.
dcterms:title: Pokec-z

dcterms:creator: Thin Nguyen
Hang Le
Thomas P Quinn
Tri Nguyen
Thuc Duy Le
Svetha Venkatesh
dcterms:description: The Pokec-n dataset is also drawn from Pokec, focusing on a different province in Slovakia. The sensitive attribute is the region of a user, and the aim is to predict the field of work of a user.
dcterms:title: Pokec-n

dcterms:creator: Enyan Dai
Suhang Wang
dcterms:description: The NBA dataset includes the age, nationality (US vs. overseas), and salary of NBA players for the 2016-2017 season. Players are connected if one follows another on Twitter, with nationality as the sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: NBA

dcterms:creator: Yushun Dong
Ninghao Liu
Brian Jalaian
Jundong Li
dcterms:description: The Credit dataset contains age, education, and payment patterns of credit card customers. Links among customers are determined by the pairwise similarity of their credit accounts, with age as the sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: Credit

dcterms:creator: Chirag Agarwal
Himabindu Lakkaraju
Marinka Zitnik
dcterms:description: The Recidivism dataset consists of defendants released on bail from 1990 to 2009. Defendants are connected if they share similar demographic information and criminal records, with race as the sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: Recidivism
